attributes.action: Take down the Christmas trees on Union street in Ryde i.o.w
attributes.additional_details: Remove them its not Christmas. It is detrimental to local business' and brings bad luck to our town of Ryde
attributes.background: The Christmas trees in Ryde haven't been removed from the lamp posts, its now march

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
